thought: To craft a crimson_door, I need to craft crimson_planks first. To craft crimson_planks, I need to place a crimson_stem into the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the crimson_stem from slot 38 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1
